name: LatinoStream
overview: Latino Stream will be an organization that focuses on bringing Spanish language entertainment to persons of Hispanic and Latino descent throughout the United States and the world. The primary target for Latino Stream will be the younger demographic, specifically persons that fall between the ages of 14-30 years of age. Latino Stream management plans to mirror these growth patterns of the Latino segment by developing a highly scalable platform that engages consumers with content and entices advertisers by offering them the opportunity to penetrate this fast growing, lucrative segment. This first of kind destination will essentially usher in a new era in Internet technology and finally give the Spanish speaking consumer a streaming website that they can truly call their own.
